snippet: An array of woven textiles is a centerpiece for “Seas of Blue: Asian Indigo Dye,” one of three new exhibitions that opened last month in the Charles B. Wang Center at Stony Brook University.
abstract: Exhibit Seas of Blue: Asian Indigo Dye, at the Charles B Wang Center at Stony Brook University, showcases textile riches from India, Indonesia, China, Korea and Japan (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: An array of woven textiles is a centerpiece for “Seas of Blue: Asian Indigo Dye,” one of three new exhibitions that opened last month in the Charles B. Wang Center at Stony Brook University.

headline.main: Seeing Asian Cultures, Through an Indigo Lens
